SDK Layout Fancy Documentation Button

SDK-specific elements ¶

SDK comes with pre-defined icons for specific types of links: API link, Guide Links, Link to the sample.

<a href="#!/api">API link</a>,
<a href="#!/guide">Guide Links</a>,
<a href="./index.html">Link to the sample</a>

CKEditor in content ¶

It's easy to put CKEditor in SDK .content:

CKEditor – The text editor for the Internet – http://ckeditor.com
